message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been valued at $10,000 by you. Considering its high quality and unique features, I believe it would be beneficial for both of us if we could come to an agreement. I am offering this exceptional product to you for $9,500. I hope we can work together to make this transaction successful.
Hi Alice, thanks for your offer! I appreciate the value of the product, but I was hoping to find something closer to $8,000. Would you be willing to meet me somewhere in the middle?

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering the value you place on the product and our aim to reach a fair agreement, I propose a price of $8,500 for the product. This is a middle ground between our previous offers, and I believe it reflects the true value of the product while accommodating your budget constraints.
